CLOUD_ENV.description: Simple environment variable to detect running in the Cloud. See https://stackoverflow.com/a/19734302/253468.

NEO4J_URL.description: Used by endpoint and sync. URL of the Neo4J graph database server, including authentication details. e.g. neo4j+s://user:pass@host:1234

SYNC_KEY.description: Used by sync (when running via heroku-scheduler-sync.sh). Private part of the Deploy Key used for GitHub
